job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pWe at neteffects are looking for a motivated strongData Scientiststrong for our direct clientppNo C2C but Neteffects sponsor work visas This is a Remote positionppbrppstrongRequired Skillsstrongpp  PhD or MS with 4 years of post MS experience in Statistics Geostatistics Mathematics or closely related fieldpp  2 years of experience in using machine learning artificial intelligence amp statistical methodologies to solve research problemspp  Proficiency in Python or in another highlevel programming languagepp  Experience in developing statistical and machine learning models for environmental and agronomical applicationspp  Experience analyzing and presenting complex data and proven problemsolving abilitiespp  Strong organizational interpersonal and written communication skillspp pp strongDesired Skillsstrongpp  Experience working with agriculturalbiological scientific data is highly desiredpp  Experience working with various environmental data and categorizing environmental variabilities using geospatial model and approach is highly desiredpp  Familiarity with geospatial data and tools and techniques required to explore geospatial data is highly desiredpp  Familiarity with deep learning architectures and techniques as well as constructing and evaluating these modelspp  Drive for translating business problems into research initiatives that deliver business valuepp  Creativity in defining challenging exploratory projectsppp
